dialogues.speaker: BLACK SCREEN
dialogues.text: Words SCRAWL UP ON SCREEN and we hear a RESOUNDING VOICE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a time of great strife, a legendary interdimensional being known as Zordon, came to the city of Angel Grove to establish a vanguard in the never ending struggle against evil.  with the aid of his trusted assistant, Alpha 5, the noble master sought out six extraordinary teenagers and gave them the power to transform into an unstoppable fighting force.  In time of great need, the young heroes could now call upon colossal assault vehicles known as "Zords".  while the identity of the six remained a guarded secret, their courageous exploits soon became the stuff of Legend, earning them the title...  The Mighty Morphin Power Rangers. We hear PUMPING ROCK AND ROLL MUSIC as the POWER RANGER'S BURST'S ONTO THE SCREEN.  Now the logo EXPLODES, revealin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A prop plane whisking across the deep blue sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YeeeoowwWWWWW!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The six Power Rangers, TOMMY, KIMBERLY, BILLY, AISHA, ADA ROCKY sport sleek sky diving suits, parachute packs and  helmets.  Tommy is strapped into a high-tech airboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're OUTTA here!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy, Rock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once we hit the target zone we've got fifteen seconds to make the drop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Step aside, pinheads. BULK and SKULL push their way through the Rangers, decked in bizarre skydiving regalia, topped off by World War II leather caps and aviator goggles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Stealth Eagle is about to fly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ditto for the Swooping Swallow. The Rangers exchange amused looks.  Aisha gestures to the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lead on, flyboys. Bulk and Skull swagger to the door and open it - the grou is a dizzying distance below.  They swallow hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bulk... where'd the earth go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five seconds to the target zone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aisha  you' re  on ! Bulk and Skull step aside, Aisha LAUNCHES herself. The others follow through the opening with flair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stylin!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On your tail!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All systems Tommy and Kimberly share an infectious glance, Kimberly a hand, indicating Tommy should go first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surf's up! He's gone.  Kimberly stands backwards in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Catch you on the flipside. Bulk and Skull watch wide-eyed as she BACK-FLIPS out of the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCK AND ROLL fills the track as the Rangers plunge towar earth, executing a series of MIND-BOGGLING MANEUVERS: SPI FISHTAILS, POWER DIVES, BACK FLIPS, you name it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bulk and Skull psyche themselves up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be the eagle.  Be the eagle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be the swallow.  Be the swallow... They take deep breaths then CHARGE THE DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaaaahhhhhhhh!!! Naturally, they get STUCK, wedged shoulder to shoulder. THE PILOT glances back, CHUCKLES and BANKS THE PLANE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bulk and Skull rotate into frame.  Now, facing straight d they FALL INTO CAMERA, CLINGING TO EACH OTHER DESPERATELY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rangers pull off more SPECTACULAR MANEUVERS then swoop TOGETHER, interlocking hands and forming a

dialogues.speaker: PERFECT CIRCLE
dialogues.text: They look to one another and a moment of pure magic passe between them.  It's not  usual the exhilaration of flight sharing, it s the exhilaration of togetherness, of being of a team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's BREAK!! They disperse and yank their rip-cords.  The sky BURSTS T WITH SIX BLOSSOMING PARACHUTES -- white, pink, blue, yell red and black in color.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAMILIES eat hot dogs and cotton candy at a huge fundrais A large banner proclaims "SAVE THE OBSERVATORY."  We see diving teams with labeled uniforms -- the BOWLING TEAM, A GROVE P.D.  and the FIRE DEPARTMENT.  There s a large whi "BULLSEYE" spray-painted on the grass.  The city's spectacular large skyline rises out of the b.g. A SPUNKY MR. KELMAN stands at a podium, speaking into a m

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, so the firemen landed four out of six inside the target -- A BOWLER shouts out playfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How `bout a show tune?! Mr. Kelman feigns seriousness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody wanna keep chose bowlers in line. A hip thirteen year old, FRED KELMAN, yells out as he poi to the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey dad, get with the program!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen, it's Angel Grove High ANGEL ON TARGET - AS AISHA touches down flawlessly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that's one!  A perfect landing! Aisha clears, then Billy and Adam land toqether.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three for three.  Look at `em go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Billy and Adam clear and now Rocky and Kimberly come in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's five perfect landings! Now it's all up to Tommy Oliver. Everybody watches with dumbfounded expressions as Tommy S IN ON HIS AIR BOARD AND SLIDES INTO DEAD CENTER.  He spre his arms wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Touch down. The families CHEER and APPLAUD as they surge forward to congratulate the Rangers. Mr. Kelman and Fred approach Tommy -  Fred and Tommy exch stylish hand slaps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking good up there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Congratulations - the Observatory's got a new lease on life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awesome!   Ryan's Comet is passing over in two days! The other Rangers approach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's up for lunch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You read my mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last one to Ernies buys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's roll!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a VOCIFEROUS SISSING SOUND, but we can't see wher coming from. - Suddenly the six Rangers come SCREAMING AR CORNER ON STATE-OF-THE-ART ROLLERBLADES.  These kids are

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear FULL-THROTTLED MUSIC as the kids WEAVE, DUCK and like blading virtuosos.  Tommy LEAPS in the air, does a 1 SKATES BACKWARD. THE HIGH BRANCHES.past a large tree as Bulk and Skull DRO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stealth Eagle, huh?  The Lame Duck is more like it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rangers GLIDE around another corner -- there's buildi one side of them and a construction site on the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's take the shortcut! Tommy leads them up a plywood ramp -- they LAUNCH TEN FEE

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH THE AIR, PULLING OFF HAIR-RAISING FREE STYLE MOVE
dialogues.text: MAKE SPECTACULAR LANDINGS on the construction site parkin structure. As they shoot across the concrete, the CAMERA PUSHES IN o 10   EXT.  INNER CITY CONSTtZUCTION SITE - DAY ... WORKERS operating heavy machinery -- cranes, bulldoze etc., Construction Worker  jackhammers solid rock.  Drill makes a CLANGING SOUND as it HITS METAL!  A baffled look over him as he stops the jackhammer, brushes away debris. uncovering an ANCIENT IRON PLATE.  He gapes at it, too st to speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large hook has been fastened to the iron plate -- a cra ENGINE ROARS as it HOISTS THE PLATE UP, revealing a CAVER OPENING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO MORE CONSTRUCTION WORKERS have joined the first, all them look on in amazement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whadda you figure it is?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, ya got me. Suddenly a PURPLE STEAM POURS from the opening.  And now something really amazing happens.   .. A menacing STONE CLAW RISES UP, CRADLING A HUGE STONE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I'll be damned. As though drawn by it's power, he moves to touch it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A T.V.  REPORTER is talking into camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're here at the World Center Construction Site, where a mysterious object was just uncovered in a freak accident in which one workman suffered minor injuries... 12                                                thru    OMITTED 13

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the reporter then a few cuts of GEOLOGISTS combing site with scanning equipment and COPS sealing off the are yellow tape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Angel Grove Police have cordoned off the area until it can be determined whether or not the unidentified object poses any threat.  The injured workman was quoted as saying... PULL BACK TO REVEAL A CAFE. The Rangers are at a table -- Tommy is teaching Fred mart moves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's one smooth move and then you've gotta explode off the top. Tommy executes a wicked JUMPING ROUNDHOUSE KICK.  Fred is wowed.  He drops into position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice and easy. The jovial proprietor, ERNIE, approaches the Rangers' tab with a loaded tray.  Fred pulls off a dazzling JUMPING ROUNDHOUSE KICK and almost knocks Ernie's tray over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, no Karate on the patio!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, Ernie, it's Tae-Kwan Doe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well Tae-Kwan-Do-it some place else. Fred moves off as Ernie serves the desserts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, what're the plans for the weekend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aisha and.I are checking out a new dance spot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I heard that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be at the Observatory Sunday.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right - Ryan's Comet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should throw a little comet shindig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any excuse for a party. Aisha reacts to something off screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Eagle has landed. Bulk and Skull swagger past followed by a GROUP OF KIDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The earth was hurtling toward us at seven hundred miles per hour, and we knew at that moment that we were facing death straight in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We could smell it's breath. Ernie moves off after Bulk and Skull.  Tommy's wrist communicator BEEPS.  The kids exchange glances than look private area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a spot over there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They move out of everybody's sight. TOMMY (into  communicator)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's up, Alpha? ALPHA 5 (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rangers, we need you at the Command  Center,  L.R.N. ! Aisha gives Kimberly a puzzled look. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'Like Right Now.' TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're on our way. They hit their wrist-communicators and instantly TRANSFOR INTO SIX IRIDESCENT COLUMNS OF COLOR.  The columns SHOOT THROUGH a giant oak tree, KNOCKING LEAVES LOOSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zordon's remote headquarters protrudes from a craggy mountain top -- silhouetted by a glorious sunset.  The SI OF COLOR slice downward into the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything's gone haywire   buttons BLINK, emergency lights FLASH, there's a CACOPHONY OF ELECTRONIC SOUNDS. ALPHA 5 works frantically amidst the array of computer banks while ZORDON looks on from his COLUMN OF LIGHT. The six Rangers MATERIALIZE, Tommy turns to Zordon. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening? ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ay,  yi,  yi,  yi,  yi !  Our thermionic-sensors have been hit by a CATACLYSMIC surge of evil! ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rangers, you must act swiftly. The planet is in GRAVE danger! KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Danger from what? ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six thousand years ago a morphological being known as Ivan Ooze, ruled the world with a reign of unparalleled terror. Finally, a rebel factor known as the "Order of the Meledon" lured him into a hyperlock chamber and buried him deep underground. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a place that came to be known as Angel Grove. ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chamber has been accidently UNCOVERED!  You must return it to the depths. or  anyone should open it and Ivan is released! ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To assist you I have retro-fitted your helmets with new Opti-Scan devices. ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use extreme caution, Rangers. You are dealing with an evil here that is beyond ALL comprehension.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barricades and police tape surround the egg.  A  SECURITY passes his sleeping CO-WORKER, drops into a chair, sips h coffee.                    BZZWAPP -- ZEDD, RITA, GOLDAR and a short, fat, furry cre named MORDANT appear. RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another Saturday night and I'm traipsing around the galaxy with the THREE LITTLE PIGS!  My mother warned me this would happen! Rita, she said, after 89 marriages you might wanna think about throwing in the towel.  Why didn't I listen to her?! Zedd grumbles to himself. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a good question. The stunned guard stirs his sleeping buddy. FIRST SECURITY GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... Kurt...  you might wanna take a look at this. Kurt looks up groggily. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No need to wake him.  In fact, why don't you take a little nap yourself. Zedd ZAPS THE GUYS with a bolt from his staff -- they are knocked out. Goldar steps back from the blast and accidentally steps o Mordant's foot.  Mordant KNOCKS on Goldar's metallic leg. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey bonehead, get off my hoof! Goldar is oblivious.  Zedd, stands reverently before the glowing egg shape. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After two thousand years of searching...  I have finally found you. Mordant BANGS on Goldar's leg again. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yo, earth to Bigfoot! Goldar SWATS Mordant. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch your mouth, fuzz-ball! ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: SILENCE
dialogues.text: RITA (to  Goldar)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you FIND this rabid little rodent, anyway?! GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mordant's my second cousin three times removed on my mother's side.  He`s just visiting for the summer. RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well put a muzzle on him! Mordant GRUMBLES under his breath.  Meanwhile, Zedd aims staff at the chamber and BURSTS a blast of energy.  The e opens up with a wHOOSH of decompressing air.  webs of ELECTRICITY BRANCH OUT, followed by a SWIRL OF BLACK SMOK When the smoke clears we see a BUBBLING, PURPLE, PHOSPHOS OOZE.  The group gathers around -- Rita sticks a finger i the sticky substance. RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What... you spent two thousand years looking for this tub of

dialogues.speaker: SNOT
dialogues.text: As if in response, the ooze BOILS AND FROTHS.  Zedd and R are too busy arguing to notice this. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you ever have anything nice to say?! RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, if I did I certainly wouldn't say it to you! We hear a SLITHERING SLURPING SOUND as the substance RISE AND TAKES ON THE GHASTLY SHAPE OF IVAN OOZE.  Mordant tug MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boss. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For your information this is not just your average, run-of-the- mill tub of snot !  RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're trying to tell me there`re different levels of snot?! MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: WHAT
dialogues.text: Zedd and Rita finally notice Ivan, standing with his lips apart, revealing jagged teeth, one of which is made of GLISTENING SILVER. He stretches his sinewy arms, releases an enormous YAWN, his hands on his head, CRACKS it. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhhhhhh. Now he SMACKS his lips together, opens his arms theatrica and gives his trademark stance. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and Gentlemen... the OOZE is back!! Rita blushes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's so cute. Zedd flashes her an angry look, turns back to Ivan. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Lord Zedd, sworn enemy of all that is good and decent.  It is a supreme honor to finally meet you. Ivan gives a slight bow. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can I ever repay you? ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you recall the name...  Zordon of Eltare? Ivan's face goes dark, THUNDER RUMBLES and the site LIGHT WITH A FLASH OF LIGHTNING.  Mordant turns to Goldar. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems to ring a bell. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want you to destroy Zordon, so that my evil may once again reign SUPREME. IVAN (hissing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will not only destroy him, I will OBLITERATE his entire being. It will be like Zordon of Eltare never EXISTED! RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, a real man. Goldar hands Ivan a scrap of paper. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's his address. IVAN (reading)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "... left off Interstate 12?!" (puzzled)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's an "interstate"? MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's like a freeway.  How long have  you  been  locked  up? ! ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We shall leave you to weave your wicked ways. RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now we go out on the town.  First dinner, then dancing, then -- BZZWAPP!!  The foursome DE-MATERIALIZE. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is that odious stench? His eyes come alive. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smell's like...   TEENAGERS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On cue, the Power Rangers TELEPORT into the construction They're surrounded by rock piles, pools of water and a pl of building supplies.  Billy looks down at the mud puddle standing in. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remind me to have a word with Alpha about his teleporting calculations. They survey the construction site for a moment. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anybody see anything? TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Let's take a look over there. They advance up a slope -- the egg comes into view. ROCKY (alarmed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like it's been opened! The kids get close to the egg, looking it over with fascination.  Suddenly a hand falls on Aisha. SECURITY GUARD (O.S.}

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! They all whirl around and see the first Security Guard. half smiles, shaking his head. SECURITY GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You had me scared there. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Makes two of us. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You haven't by any chance seen a ... morphological being lurking around? SECURITY GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only thing I've seen is you teenagers. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you know... if there's one thing in the world I reeeeally hate.... CLOSE ON HIS FACE as it SHAPE-SHIFTS INTO THE+ HIDEOUS VI IVAN OOZE. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's TEENAGERS KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GroSS! IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're too kind.  Allow me to introduce myself.  I am the infamous, world-reviled, universally despised, IVAN OOZE! ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, pack your bags cause we're sending you back where you came from! IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gee, a teenager with a big mouth. Not much has changed in six thousand years. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: we're not just teenagers, raisin- head. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers! Ivan puts his hands to his face in mock fear. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooooh, where's my autoqraph book?. He looks them over reproachfully. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Power Rangers, huh?  So Zordon is still using a bunch of rug-rats to do his dirty work.  And speaking of rats... Ivan raises both hands -- ELECTRICITY SHOOTS OUT HIS FING and the kids DIVE CLEAR as the bolt ZAPS A THRONG OF RATS Now, incredibly, the RATS GROWN INTO GRUNTING, SNARLING M SIZED RAT-BEASTS. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From this moment forth, the world as you know it SHALL CEASE TO

dialogues.speaker: EXIST
dialogues.text: Ivan raises his arms -- thunder CRACKLES and LIGHTNING RI ACROSS THE SKY. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: WELCOME TO MY NIGHTMARE
dialogues.text: An EXPLOSION OF PURPLE SMOKE CONSUMES IVAN. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's  gone.  The RATS ATTACK! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's take these beasts!! Tommy gets off a stellar CROSS-HOCK TAKEDOWN, Kimberly de a world class HEEL STOMP, Billy executes a lethal REVERSE HANDSWORD.  Despite their valiant efforts, the Rangers ar being overwhelmed by the fierce combatants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMOKE POURS from various circuit boards, numerous control panels VIBRATE. ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alpha, my sensors tell me the Rangers were too late!  Ivan is on his way here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, NOBODY enters the Command Center without a power coin! There's a BLEET, BLEET -- emergency lights start FLASHING the entrance.  Alpha watches, forlorn, as OOZE SEEPS thro the hairline cracks in the door. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...  ALMOST nobody. The ooze SLITHERS AND GURGLES ACROSS THE FLOOR, once agai IVAN RISES UP.  He takes in the state-of-the-art surround IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gee... pretty fancy-shmancy.  I guess if you invest your money well over SIXTY centuries you can buy something pretty nice. Alpha drops into a Karate stance, makes some BRUCE LEE NO then LUNGES. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: HI , YAH
dialogues.text: Ivan holds his arm out, ZAPS Alpha with an electrical cha Alpha starts spinning. ALPHA  5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to Wiener World.  May I take your order, please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You haven't changed, Ooze. You're still picking on creatures smaller than yourself. Ivan slowly circles Zordan's column of light, Zordon turn with him. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put a cork in it "Z" .  Ten minutes out of the egg and I'm already listening to one of your lectures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (he explodes furiously)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You robbed me of my PRIME!  I was the Supreme Ruler of the most foul Empire in the Universe.  I was the King of Calamity.  The Duke of Destruction.  The big man on campus! (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then you came along.  You locked me into your stuffy little hyperlock-chamber and tossed me into the depths like yesterdays

dialogues.speaker: TRASH
dialogues.text: ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It worked for six thousand years. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't remind me! IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have any idea what it's like to be cooped up in a rotten egg for six thousand years?  It's BORING!  Not to mention I've had a Charlie horse since the Renaissance!  But now the tables are turned.  Now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IVAN raises his hands - he  is holding  a flute and he PL

dialogues.speaker: NOTES
dialogues.text: IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... it's time to pay the PIPER! He uses the flute like a lightning rod --  A BOLT OF LIGH BLASTS A PANEL TO SMITHEREENS. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, the things that I have missed.  The BLACK PLAGUE! He blows up another PANEL. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SPANISH INQUISITION! (another bolt)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The  70's! HE BLOWS UP ANOTHER PANEL.  Ivan CASTS ANOTHER LIGHTNING DEMOLISHING AN ENERGY PILLAR. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now, finally, I have the strength to DESTROY your pathetic powers FOREVER!! ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: YOU WON'T GET AWAY WITH THIS
dialogues.text: IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got a NEWS flash for you

dialogues.speaker: LIGHT-BRIGHT
dialogues.text: Now Ivan begins to THROW LIGHTNING EVERYWHERE, LAYING THE  COMMAND CENTER TO WASTE. Ivan laughs in the b.g.  as Alpha continues to spin, moving  his arms in and out. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You put your left probe in, you put your left probe out, you put your left probe in and you shake it all about.  You do the hokey- pokey and you turn yourself around...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two rats charge Aisha and she LEAPS UPWARD - the pair SMA into each other. Rocky picks up a two-by-four and starts SPARRING with ano rat. Billy SHOVES A HUGE WOODEN-SPOOL down a slope and it ROLLS INTO A COUPLE OF RATS, BOWLING THEM OVER. One rat CRACKS IT'S TAIL like a whip, KNOCKING Adam to the ground. Another rat gets Kimberly in a bear hug and she makes a face. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAT breath!! She grabs a handful of his whiskers. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody needs a shave. She YANKS THEM OUT, the rat SQUEALS and releases her.  Th fight well, but the rats start to get the upperhand. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: IT'S MORPHIN TIME
dialogues.text: The Rangers click their power coins into their power morp KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: PTERODACTYL
dialogues.text: BILLY

dialogues.speaker: TRICERATOPS
dialogues.text: ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: TYRANNOSAURUS
dialogues.text: ADAM

dialogues.speaker: MASTODON
dialogues.text: AISHA

dialogues.speaker: SABER TOOTH TIGER
dialogues.text: TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: WHITE TIGER
dialogues.text: RANGERS

dialogues.speaker: MORPHENOMENAL
dialogues.text: They JUMP INTO THE AIR and they're ENGULFED IN A DAZZLING GOLDEN LIGHT as we do a 3D MOVIE VERSION OF THEIR TRANSFORMATION INTO COSTUME. They all LAND and there's a WHIRRING SOUND as all six of face pieces POLARIZE so we can see their faces.  The rats immediately scurry off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's teach these vermin a few manners. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Activating Power Beam! A YELLOW BEAM SLICES THROUGH THE DARKNESS.  Aisha leads t group through the site. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody stay alert.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: They pass a bulldozer, some scaffolding ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold it... They come to a stop. ADAM (pointing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I heard something over there. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Activating Audio Enhancer! AN AUTO-PHONIC RECEIVER POPS OUT of the side of Billy's helmet.  As he turns his head, the receivers ROTATE. SOUND EFFECT:  We hear silence and then... a RASPY BREATHING, followed by a GUTTURAL SNARL. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're on the other side of that wall. The Rangers advance along a cement wall, slowly round a corner.  Aisha's light PANS THROUGH THE GLOOM. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anybody see them? ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Activating Power Scope! A SCOPE SNAPS into place over Rocky's left eye.

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH POWER TRACKER
dialogues.text: We see HEAT SENSOR OUTLINES, PULSATING WITH COLOR.  COMMA GRAPHIC:  SEARCH MODE. Lines VECTOR and SCAN as Rocky searches the area.  Eventu he looks up and the lines LOCK ON TO THE PULSATING FORMS THE RATS. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: THEY'RE ABOVE US
dialogues.text: The creatures LEAP DOWN and we see the Rangers pull off   KICKS, SUCKER PUNCHES, SPINBACK-ROUNDHOUSES, you name it. One of the beasts TACKLES Tommy and the pair go TUMBLING  OWN A TWENTY FOOT ROCK PILE.  Aisha picks up a handful of AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, handsome! A beast turns -- Aisha FLINGS dirt in his eyes. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My mistake. She follows through with an OVER SHOULDER THROW -- the beast CRASHES INTO A JOHNNY-ON-THE-SPOT. Rocky fights another beast and the creature SWINGS UP THROUGH SCAFFOLDING with phenomenal dexterity.  Rocky after him. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: SABA SABER
dialogues.text: The talking Saber appears in Tommy's hand. SABA (yawning)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a DREAM I was having! TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got company. Saba sees the rats. SABA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rats!  I hate rats! We hear a PRIMITIVE CRY as a beast SLAMS INTO ADAM, SENDS HIM CATAPULTING.  Adam rises, speaks in a low growl ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad move, Willard!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds his hand in the air. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: STEGA-STINGER
dialogues.text: The STEGA-STINGER appears in Adam`s hand.  He aims it toward an overhang, FIRES.  A thin wire SHOOTS OUT -- Stinger at the end PIERCES the overhang. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coming through! Adam leaps off a platform, SWINGS THROUGH THE AIR like Ta SLAMS into the rat and sends him CATAPULTING. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Target Neutralized? KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raptor-Ribbon! A contraption APPEARS in Kimberly's hand and she throws h out -- a LONG RIBBON SWIRLS out and tangles itself around rat. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you see `em. She yanks the ribbon pulling the rat into an opening -- h DISAPPEARS. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you don't. Billy takes a hit, ROLLS across the ground.  He stops inc away from a twenty foot drop-off. The beast CHARGES HIM, he ducks and the beast GOES FLYING

dialogues.speaker: OF WATER.
dialogues.text: BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not the brightest of beasts. Rocky is now up in the scaffolding.  He DROPS TEN FEET th the air, LANDS ON ONE END OF A BOARD. There's a beast at the other end and he goes FLIPPING THR THE AIR. Tommy throws Saba Saber and the knife SWOOPS THROUGH THE and zings around the beasts as they try to knock him down SABA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Na na na na na! The rats chase after Saba as he heads into a water-slicke area.  There's a large power cable running across it.  On all the rats are in the water, Saba kamikaze dives into t cable, SLICING IT OPEN WITH AN ERUPTION OF SPARKS.  The w SIZZLES WITH ELECTRICITY and the rats GO UP IN A PUFF OF SABA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fried mice, anyone? We see the six original small rats scurry away, SQUEAKING Suddenly, there's an EXPLOSION OF ELECTRICAL ACTIVITY and Rangers watch, stunned, as their COSTUMES DE-MATERIALIZE they appear back in civilian clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?! Billy tries his wrist communicator. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alpha, come in! There's no response. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'd better get back. They all hit their communicators and nothing happens. AISHA (worried)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's wrong! TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, guys... They hurry off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rangers climb a mountain path, all of them looking al Up ahead, there's a PILLAR OF BLACK SMOKE rising from the Command Center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place is trashed -- there's SMOKING debris, ravaged exposed wires and mechanisms.  The kids move through the wreckage in numb silence. TOMMY (barely audible)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... what happened here?... Adam spots Alpha's arm protruding from a mound of rubble. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys! The kids quickly uncover the battered robot. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alpha, are you okay?! ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll GET you my pretty, and your little DOG toa!! BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He must've blown an anitromic demodulator! KIMBERLY (stunned)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no... Everybody follows Kimberly's gaze, thunderstruck expressi coming over them. Laying on a destroyed bed of crystals is Zordon.  He is s SHIMMERING SPECTRAL being, only now he s aged a good fift years. The kids stand over him, forlorn. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... What's happening to him?'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside of his time warp he's aging at a vastly acellerated rate! KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to help him! Zordon opens his eyes. ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...  Rangers... thank goodness you're safe. The kids drop down beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to get you back inside your time warp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid that's impossible... The power has been destroyed. It's gone... The Zords, the weapons...  all of it. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mighty Morphin Power Rangers are no more. The kids are stunned.  Kimberly gently takes Zordon's han KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zordon... you can't leave us. Ever since you came into our lives... you've been like another father `to  us  all.- ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... You must be strong... Ivan almost overthrew the planet once...  and now I'm afraid he has the strength to see his scheme through. Zordon closes his eyes.  Tommy puts a hand on Kimberly's shoulder.  The kids slowly rise, all of them looking utte despondent.  Billy turns to Alpha. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: what're we going to do? ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do not LIKE Green Eggs and Ham! I do not like them, Sam-I-am! Billy opens a panel on Alpha's back, makes an adjustment. Alpha's head rolls back like he's going to sneeze. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah-Ah-Ahhhh-CHOO!! SPARKS BURST from where his nose should be.  He SNIFFS. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, Billy. Rocky hands Alpha a hanky, Alpha wipes his nose area. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There has to be something we can do. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, guys, think! Aisha turns to Alpha. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alpha.  Is there any way we can defeat this  monster?  Any way at all? ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Perhaps there is a way... I have heard tales of another power. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?! ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... They say that somewhere beyond the Hyperion Constellation there exists a mythological power that is beyond all comprehension. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can we get to it? ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the legend goes, the power is impossible to obtain. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to try, Alpha.  It's our only hope. Alpha shakes his head. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's far too dangerous.  Zordon would never allow it. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we don't try, Zordon won't survive! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If Ivan  Ooze  isn't  stopped, nobody will survive. Alpha heaves a sigh. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ay, yi, yi, yi. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The legend speaks of a Master Warrior who lives on the planet Phaedos... This is the only person who knows the secrets of the power. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can we reach Phaedos? Alpha heaves a SIGH. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zordon's going to have my orbicular spheroids when he hears out about this! The kids exchange curious looks as Alpha opens a compartm and removes a vile filled with RADIOLUMINESCENT ENERGY. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is an emergency reserve of morphonic emissions.  It should be enough to get -you there. He approaches a damaged panel, loads in the vile. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is one problem.  I only have enough reserve to send you Phaedos...  I can't bring you back. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So how do we get back? Alpha gives them a grim look. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... You'll have to pray that the legends are true. Alpha keys in coordinates. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sure you want to do this?! The Rangers share purposeful looks. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's our only hope. Alpha shakes his head, punches in the final codes. ALPHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Safe journey, Rangers! He pulls a lever. ALPHA  5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids TRANSFORM INTO SIX STREAKS OF COLOR AND BLAST 0F THROUGH THE CEILING.  Alpha shakes his head in despair. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ay, yi, yi, yi.  They're DOOMED!! 23 thru 27        OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the SIX COLORED STREAKS BLAST away from earth and PAST the moon. The CAMERA MOVES IN on Zedd's ominous palace which rises of the tortured landscape.  Zedd, Rita, Mordant and Golda standing on the balcony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zedd, Rita and their minions are inside Zedd's dark palac Goldar looks through Rita's telescope as Rita rants. RITA (outraged)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How could he let them slip through his hands?!  He's no better than the rest of the hired help around here! Goldar looks up from the telescope. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: According to the TX Tracker, they're headed for Phaedos. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna fire that slimeball so fast his not gonna know what hit him! Ivan sweeps regally into the room. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, honey, I'm home ! RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You garlic-sucking DINGLEBRAIN! The Rangers are going after the Great Power (to  Zedd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you said this guy was the Master of Disaster? (to  Ivan)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's nothing but a slime- infested, jelly-bellied blob of -- Ivan SNAPS his hand -- a WAD OF OOZE FLIES OUT, SPLATS RI across the mouth, muffling her. RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rrgh mmffpprr brghuh!! ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How dare you?!  Nobody shuts up Rita but me! IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, slick, there's been a slight'change of plans. (arms out in trademark stance)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The "booger man" is taking over. Ivan drops regally into Zedd's chair. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody double-crosses Lord Zedd and lives! Mordant slips behind Goldar, using him as a shield. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zedd's gonna kick this snotball into next week! Zedd SHOOTS A BLAST from his staff -- Ivan is COVERED IN IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooooh, that tickles! Ivan raises his hands and the sparks DISAPPEAR. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My turn. He ZAPS Rita and Zedd, and with a BRILLIANT FLASH, THEY'R Mordant moves to a snow-globe on the table, his mouth fal open.  Zedd and Rita are INSIDE IT!! Rita wipes the ooze off her mouth, RANTS IN A MUNCHKIN VO RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is all your fault!  If you'd taken me out tonight like you were suposed to, none of this would've happened. Ivan turns menacingly to Goldar and Mordant. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you have a choice, either serve me, or join those insufferable cheesedongs. Mordant and Goldar exchange a look, then turn back to Iva GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We never liked the cheesedongs in the first place. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Couldn''t stand them -- low-class all the way.  And did you catch a whiff of their BREATH?!  It's like having a conversation with a couple of ONIONS!  Not to mention... Goldar throws a hand over Mordant's mouth, MUFFLING him. GOLDAR (apologetic)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's just visiting for the summer. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now what about,the Rangers, oh hideous one? IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah yes, the RANGERS!!! He makes a HOARKING SOUND then SPITS OOZE ONTO THE FLOOR, MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gasunteidt. Now the OOZE GROWS INTO TEN TENGU WARRIORS -- BIRD-LIKE CREATURES WITH LONG BEAKS AND ENORMOUS WINGS. THEY GOBBLE, SQUAWK AND CHIRP like newborn chickens, the CACOPHONY GROWING LOUDER AND LOUDER until... IVAN

dialogues.speaker: SHUT YOUR BEAKS
dialogues.text: The Tengu fall dead silent. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tengu Warriors, you will fly to Phaedos, find the Power Rangers...  and TEAR THEM APART! The creatures make HORRENDOUS SQUAWKING SOUNDS AS THEY SP THEIR REPTILIAN WINGS. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mordant, go with them and report back to me! MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know boss, I'd really like to help out but I've got this gastronomic condition which rules out all space trave-- One of the Tengu grabs hold of Mordant and the FLOCK WING LIKE COLOSSAL BATS. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zedd waves his arms around in outrage. ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isn't this just TYPICAL!  We finally do somebody a good turn and just look what happens! RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From now on it's E-V-I-L, NO exceptions! RITA (optional line)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It just goes to show, ya never go into business with a booger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Tengu warriors sweep toward us -- we see Mordant dang from one of the Tengu's talons. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch the HAIRRRRRRRR!! He SWINGS PAST CAMERA and out of sight. 30  thru  32A  OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COLORED STREAKS OF LIGHT SHOOT THROUGH THE COSMOS, heading down toward the planet, PHAEDOS.  It's emerald green with two radiant golden circles around it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The STREAKS OF COLOR hit the jungle floor and only FIVE MATERIALIZE. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody okay? KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where' s  BILLY? ! The kids search the sky in a panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alpha works frantically hitting buttons and levers. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ay, yi, yi, yi!  The filamentary transistors have malfunctioned! SPARKS erupt from the panel, SINGING ALPHA.  He snarls. ALPHA  5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why you low-frequency, battery operated -- Alpha winds up and DELIVERS A MIGHTY KICK to the panel. suddenly comes to life with BLEEPS and BLIPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rangers continue scouring the sky as BILLY COMES FLYI BILLY

dialogues.speaker: WHOAAAAAAHHHH
dialogues.text: He SPLASHES DOWN in a puddle. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: BILLY
dialogues.text: The others quickly gather around him. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay? BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think so. Billy looks down at the puddle. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This puddle thing is really getting on my nerves. They help Billy up then take in the exotic jungle environ They hear all sorts of EXOTIC ANIMAL SOUNDS. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to beautiful downtown Phaedos. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Incredible... Tommy gives them all an invigorating look. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see if we can find this Master warrior. He leads the team down a narrow path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Establishing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivan is walking through a giant chemical plant with Golda IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taking over the world is one thing.  It's finding good help to run it for you that's the killer. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want me to place a few calls? Ivan shakes his head. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No need.   I'm going to use the young minds of Angel Grove. GOLDAR digs for buried treasure deep in his nose. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No offense, boss, but they might find you a little disgusting. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, well, I suppose you'd know a little something about that. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not to worry.  I'll ever so gently lure them in and mold them into an army of devils!  And what better way to entice them ... than with a little Ivan's Ooze?! Ivan approaches an enormous vat, turns a tap -- it BURPS GLOPS as PURPLE OOZE pours out. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But boss, what about their parents? IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, the old and doddering.  I'm going to SCOURGE their puny minds, reducing them to ZOMBIE'S. And then I'll put them to work rebuilding my empire. Bulk and Skull enter waving a "help wanted" flier.  Both them are wearing their garish blazers and dark sunglasses SKULL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand you're looking for a few new assistants. Bulk does a G.Q. stance. BULK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well put your mind to rest `cause now you've got the best. Ivan doesn't look too pleased. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?!  I advertised for brilliant and good looking assistants! Skull extends his hand. SKULL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, I'm brilliant. BULK (hand extended)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I'm good looking. Ivan steps forward. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I'm Little-Bo-Peep. Bulk and Skull lower the sunglasses and take a good look Ivan.  Both of them swallow hard. SKULL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bulk... why don't we give Mr. Peep here a chance to think it over? BULK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A stellar idea, Skull. They start to back away. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so fast, greaseballs. Goldar blocks their way. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll have to do. 34   thru   38   OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rangers move through foreboding jungle terrain, their alert to all the UNEARTHLY SOUNDS around them.  Tommy wat Kimberly, who seems to be lost in thought. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. Kimberly glances up. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay? Kimberly takes a moment to answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was just thinking about Zordon...  everything we've been through together. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, meeting Zordon... teaming up with you guys, it's the best thing that's ever happened to me. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the best thing that's ever happened to all of us. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... He's gonna make it, guys. The others nod in agreement. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll get this warrior...  save Zordon...  and send that SLIMEBALL Ivan Ooze back to the SEWER he crawled out of. Tommy's words sink in.  He stops suddenly, sensing someth ANGLE ON - MORDANT hiding behind a tree, watching the Ran pass. There's a HORRIFIC SCREECH -- the kids look up as the TEN

dialogues.speaker: WARRIORS COME SWEEPING OUT OF THE SKY
dialogues.text: ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: TAKE COVER
dialogues.text: It's too late.  The Tengu attack with unbelievable feroci They SLASH with their claws, STAB with their beaks and BA with their wings. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: THEY'RE T00 STRONG
dialogues.text: ADAM

dialogues.speaker: WE NEED OUR POWERS
dialogues.text: Rocky is hurtled into some bushes, Aisha is knocked again tree, Adam splashes down in a small creek.  Mordant watch of this from the sidelines.  He gets so excited that he s throwing punches and kicks. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: WHAM
dialogues.text: He accidently punches a tree. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the Tengu gets Kimberly in a choke-hold, TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: HANG ON, KIMBERLY.
dialogues.text: Tommy rushes to help her and another Tengu trips him -- h TUMBLES HEAD OVER HEELS DOWN A SLOPE.  We hear an OTHERWO CRY as a small, hunched figure wearing a tattered robe SW IN ON A VINE. He proceeds to pull off what is nothing short of a miracl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He uses the STICKS for weapons as he executes a ROUNDHOUS KICK, a SCISSOR-KICK TAKEDOWN, a SITTING SIDE KICK, a ROUNDHOUSE DROP SPIN BACK KICK, a PARALLEL BLOCK FROM THE OUTSIDE, a REVERSE HANDSWORD and so on. The creature punctuates the hits with an exotic variation BRUCE LEE NOISES. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the matter with you woodpeckers!  Take this guy out! The Tengu SQUAWK and SQUEAL as the little dynamo WAILS ON MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Tengu Warriors my butt!  The Tengu TURKEYS is more like it! Finally the Tengu retreat, WINGING UP THROUGH THE TREES. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, aren't you bird-brains forgetting something?! One of the Tengu SWOOPS IN AND SNATCHES Mordant up. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch the meathooks!! The Rangers recover and exchange expressions of utter dis

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow!  That was amazing for such a little dude! The figure speaks in a HOARSE WHISPER. FIGURE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're trespassing. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now state your business. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're looking for the Master Warrior.  Do you know where we can find him? FIGURE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Master Warrior doesn't entertain visitors  - KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we have to find him.  Our leader Zordon is dying. FIGURE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zordon? Now the most amazing thing happens.  The figure RISES TO HEIGHT OF SIX FEET, while simultaneously shedding it's ro Underneath is a SCANTILY CLAD, STUNNING AMAZONIAN WOMAN. talking B-U-I-L-T.  Meet the Master warrior, DULCEA. The Rangers stand there with stunned expressions.  Dulcea to Tommy. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did this happen?! Tommy just gapes.  Kimberly gives him a cold glance and T him one with her elbow. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lady asked you a question. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh ... Oh, uh, we re, ah... Kimberly intervenes. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was attacked by this horrific being -- Ivan Ooze. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivan Ooze is free?!  We are all in mortal danger! She moves off - the Rangers just stand there staring at e other. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let' s go. The Rangers quickly follow her through the brush Aisha tu to Kimberly, speaks under her breath. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kind of bossy, isn't she?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a label with a picture of Ivan -- he's wearing ma to make him a little more presentable. DOZENS OF KIDS Ranging in age from eight to seventeen, ar Bulk and Skull, who have set up a booth with a large bann that reads:      "FREE OOZE!" Some kids STRETCH the ooze, others MOLD it, others THROW each other.  It's an ooze free-for-all. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boys and girls, girls and boys, gather round and feast your eyes. This ain't sludge and this ain't guck... this is the one and only Ivan's Ooze!  Yesireebob.  It's ooey, gooey and even kind of chewy.  But best of all it's

dialogues.speaker: FREE
dialogues.text: Bulk and Skull run a booth.   A banner screams "OOZE RULE Kids crowd around. BULK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here you go!  No pushing! SKULL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's enough for everybody! Fred approaches. FRED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So where'd this guy come from? Bulk and Skull exchange apprehensive looks. SKULL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... that's classified, top secret, confidential, undercover information. BULK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we told you -- we'd have to kill you. Fred looks at the container in his hand but he doesn't op Skull sees a kid HURL some ooze at him. SKULL

dialogues.speaker: INCOMING
dialogues.text: Skull ducks and Bulk gets SPLATTERED in the face.  Bulk g Skull, wipes some goop off, FLICKS it at Skull. WIZARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, come all -- it's an COZE

dialogues.speaker: FREE FOR ALL
dialogues.text: He smiles, revealing a glistening silver tooth. 40   thru   42   OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An oriental garden set against a stunning hillside vista.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids are seated on rocks by a lakeside, all of them drinking from clay mugs.  Dulcea finishes handing out bow Aisha stares into hers with a grim expression. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this... food! DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're called squirbs. Kimberly lifts out an EEL-LIKE CREATURE, and watches it S between her fingers. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine seems to be a little undercooked. Dulcea sprinkles hers with brown flakes. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Add a few dried weevils and you'll never know the difference. The other Rangers watch as Billy holds one of the squirbs his mouth and drops it in.  He chews a few times, lets ou BURP. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Not bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, we appreciate your hospitality, but we really don't have much time. Dulcea looks to Tommy. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you know of the Great Power? KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only that we need it to defeat Ivan Ooze. Dulcea's eyes move from Ranger to Ranger. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is said that to those who possess the Power... all things are possible. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did it originate? DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In another time, another dimension.  It was brought here long ago by the "Nathadians", a people who are now all but extinct. They built an impenetrable stone Monolith to store the power and keep it from their enemies. (ominous)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For thousands of years, beings from all over the Universe have tried to obtain it... ALL have perished. Dulcea's words hang heavily in the air. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So how can we get to it? DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only way to obtain the power is to achieve the highest state of being... TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And how do we do that? DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By learning the ancient art of Ninjetti.  It is the Genesis of what you on earth have come to know as the Ninja. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is the perfect union of mind, body and spirit. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, Zordon doesn't have much longer to live.  And for all we know, Angel Grove could already be under attack.  We don't have TIME for this. As Rocky is talking, a flubbery looking SNOUT works it's over Kimberly's shoulder.  She hasn't noticed it yet. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't understand.  If you do  not have the Ninjetti, the power will destroy  you. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To reach the Monolith we must traverse the Neola jungle.  We will train today, and set out on foot tomorrow. The snout works it's way underneath Kimberly's chin -- sh SCREAMS FOR ALL SHE'S WORTH. INCLUDE - A TERRIFIED SNOGGLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Dulcea's ant-eater like assistant.   He jumps up down, YAMMERING and GESTICULATING. SNOGGLE

dialogues.speaker: GBUJIPHN HUPHLGMPNORU
dialogues.text: DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snoggle, you watch your language! Snoggle now re-fills Aisha's tea-cup. SNOGGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slnughyu buglhugrmrph? AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me? SNOGGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slnughyu buglhugrmrph? DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wants to know if you'd like a cube of sugar in your tea. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah... sure. We hear a PHOOT as Snoggle BLOWS A CUBE OF SUGAR OUT HIS AND IT SPLASHES INTO AISHA'S TEA.  Aisha stares at the cu moment. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah... thanks. The other Rangers watch as Billy holds one of the squibs his mouth and drops it in.  He chews a few times, lets ou BURP. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Not bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night has fallen on Angel Grove.  We PAN ACROSS a quiet, class neighborhood, settle on a two story house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We PULL BACK to reveal it's sitting on a table. Mr Kelman enters, looks it over curiously.  He picks it u opens it and sticks his finger inside. Suddenly a CRACKLING ELECTRICAL CURRENT RUNS OVER HIS ENT BODY.  His face goes blank and his eyes momentarily GLOWS PURPLE.  Now he strides purposefully out the door. 43C   thru   47   OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dulcea and the Rangers are gathered around a bird-bath st with FLAMES leaping out of it. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the language of the Nathadians, "Nin" stands for "man", "jetti" stands for "animal".  Ninjetti  - man and animal, together as one. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, put your hands inside the flame. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, right. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It will not harm you. The kids hesitate a moment, then reluctantly put their ha inside the flame.  Aisha makes a horrific expression... AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just kidding. They remove their hands -- they're filled with sand. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow.  Sand. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now tell me... what do you see? Aisha studies the sand for a moment -- it MAGICALLY TAKE THE SHAPE OF A BEAR. AISHA (bedazzled)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see... a bear DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aisha, you are the Bear, stalwart and bold. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stylin'! Dulcea turns to Rocky.  His sand MAGICALLY TAKES ON THE S OF AN APE. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see... an Ape. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocky, you are the Mighty Ape. We see each of them DISCOVER THEIR ANIMAL. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see... a fox DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close.  Billy, you are the Wolf, cunning and swift. And now Kimberly.  She studies hers for a moment.  It loo like a bird. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think its some kind of bird. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kimberly, you are the Crane, agile and sublime. Now Adam. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's gotta be a frog. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam, you are the Frog, quick as lightning. And finally, Tommy. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's... an eagle? DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... A falcon? DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tommy, you are the Falcon, Winged Lord of the Sky.   Kimberly regards Dulcea with true admiration. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know so much about the Ninjetti? Dulcea stands tall and proud. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... am the sole living descendant of the "Nathadians". (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now prepare yourselves for the most intense physical and mental training known to man and animal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred enters the living room and searches for his Dad. FRED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad...                          He heaves a frustrated sigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred enters the empty master bedroom, a look of concern c over him. FRED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fred comes outside as several KIDS approach, all of them looking forlorn. KID #1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You seen my parents? FRED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't find my dad either. KID #2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?! Suddenly a WILD KID wearing grunge clothes runs by HOWLIN A BANSHEE.  He's holding a container of ooze in one hand baseball bat in the other.  He SMASHES a couple of trash with his bat. WILD KID

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooze, ooze, ooze rules!! The kid BASHES IN a mailbox then runs off.  Fred looks startled. FRED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That guy was the student body President 49   thru   50   OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kimberly and Snoggle observe as Dulcea walks ON HER HANDS across a narrow bamboo log that spans a pond.  A waterfal churns in the b.g. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crane maintains it's agility through the perfect harmony of mind, body and spirit. She leaps into the air, does a ROUND-HOUSE KICK, lands perfectly on the narrow span. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awesome! Dulcea reaches the end of the log, flips through the air flawlessly on the ground. Kimberly heaves a sigh, climbs onto the bamboo and start walking across, balancing precariously on her hands. She gets about a quarter of the way, loses her balance, a falls into the shallow pond. Snoggle laughs, making a loud HONKING SOUND.  Kimberly recovers, shoots him a look. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see you do it . SNOGGLE (indignant)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ghun Phnug Gnouphl. He marches to the pole, Dulcea holds him back. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snoggle, we don't have time for you to show off 52   thru   53   OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dulcea and Rocky are standing at the bottom of a twenty f with an exotic oriental carving DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ape is strong, but more importantly it is flexible and free. Dulcea now SCRAMBLES UP THE POLE WITH THE NIMBLENESS OF A SPIDER.  In less than ten seconds she reaches the top.  R shakes his head in disbelief. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this lady? Now she SLIDES DOWN like a firewoman, drops beside Rocky. takes hold of the pole, focuses for a moment. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here goes! It starts SCURRYING UPWARD.  He gets about fifteen feet i air, loses his grip, PLUMMETS AND SLAMS TO THE GROUND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dulcea and Billy circle one another, fighting with spinni WHISTLING sticks. Dulcea is blindfolded, Billy isn't.                     DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wolf relies on it's enhanced senses to guide it...  He can hear what we cannot hear, he can smell what we cannot smell. Billy takes SWING after SWING -- Dulcea easily DEFLECTS e blow. Now Dulcea takes numerous SWINGS, THWACKING Billy repeate and finally KNOCKING him INTO THE WATER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dulcea, Adam and Snoggle stand in an area filled with FLY INSECTS. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The frog remains still and silent while it assesses its target... then strikes out in the blink of an eye. We hear a TRILLING SOUND as Dulcea watches some kind of i dart around her. THWAP!  The TRILLING SOUND is gone.  Dulcea has literally caught the insect in the blink of an eye.  Adam shakes hi in disbelief. He waits a moment, hears a TAT-TAT-TAT sound and watches insect zip around him.  He lashes out numerous times, missing the insect completely. THWUMP!  With lightning speed Snoggle VACUUMS the fly int snout.  CRUNCH, CRUNCH, CRUNCH. Adam speaks under his breath. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Show off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aisha watches as Dulcea goes into a bear stance. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bear is sturdy as a towering tree.  Nothing can uproot it. Snoggle CHARGES Dulcea, SLAMS INTO HER.  She remains as r as a tree.  Snoggle meanwhile suffers some serious bodily damage. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Girl, you've got to be kidding me. Snoggle recovers and faces Aisha.  Aisha shrugs, goes int bear stance.  Snoggle charges, SLAMS INTO HER and sends H

dialogues.speaker: FLYING
dialogues.text: 54D   thru   54E   OMITTED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dulcea and Tommy are standing on a towering rock rising o a dark lake. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The falcon never struggles with the air, but rather becomes one with it. Now Dulcea does the impossible.  She LEAPS OFF THE ROCK, FIFTY FEET through the air, AND LANDS on another protrudi rock.  Tommy is stunned. DULCEA (calling out)

dialogues.speaker: JOIN WITH THE FORCES OF NATURE
dialogues.text: Tommy psyches himself up. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can do this.  You can do this.  You can do this... He spreads his arms out, LEAPS... and DROPS LIKE A ROCK exploding into THE BLACK WATER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alpha fusses over Zordon, who is looking a good ten years ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Alpha, I am deeply concerned about the Rangers... ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told them it was too dangerous, but they wouldn't listen. ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... We must try to communicate with them. Alpha looks out over the decimated Command Center. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps if I could locate a vertical-deflector then I could assemble a holographic-comlink. Zordon shudders in pain, closes his eyes.  Alpha watches his mentor, shakes his head in anguish. ALPHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ay, yi, yi, yi, yi .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dulcea leads the kids through a circular opening in one wall, all of them look completely wiped out.  She reaches ornate doorway, faces the Rangers. DULCEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Each of you must reach deep within and draw upon your natural instincts...  Only then will you know the way of the Ninjetti. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rest for a few hours.  We will continue at daybreak. She heads through the door. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So where are we supposed to sleep? Snoggle points to the campfire. SNOGGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buhph nghujr. He pushes Kimberly toward it making a "Na na na na na" so through his snout.  He then hurries inside and SLAMS the KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That guy's cruisin' for a bruisin'. The kids approach the dying fire, all of them limping a l BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can hardly walk... AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never been this sore in my life. They drop around the fire, a few of them GROANING.  They into the orange coals for a long moment, all of them look disillusioned. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you guys really think we can pull this off? It takes a moment to get a response. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe if we had more time. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I wonder... We've been relying on our Morphin Powers for so long... maybe we've forgotten how to rely on ourselves. There's a somber silence. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should get some rest. They all settle in for the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PURPLE HAZE OF SMOKE has settled on the construction si Suddenly, mysteriously, SWARMS OF ZOMBIFIED PARENTS emerg the vapors - We see Mr. Kelman amongst them. Ivan steps forward, followed by Goldar. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen, Simon says...  STOP! All the parents stop. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Simon says... stand on one foot! All the parents stand on one foot.  Ivan seems to be taki perverse glee in all this. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Simon says... GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quack like a'duck! All the parents start QUACKING LIKE DUCKS.   Ivan slowly to Goldar, gives him an icy stare. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It just slipped out. Ivan turns back to the QUACKING parents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IVAN

dialogues.speaker: SHUT UP
dialogues.text: The parents keep quacking. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't say "Simon says". IVAN (irritated)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Simon says SHUT UP!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (they shut up) Now, as soon as I give the word     I want all of you to start digging. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do I make myself perfectly -- The zombie parents have already started going to work.  I shakes his head in exasperation. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the Iast time I use parents for anything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rangers are fast asleep.  A night wind WHISTLES throu trees, causing the branches to shiver. After a moment, there's movement in the bushes.  Suddenly amazingly, a WOLF emerges -- his mane glistening in the moonlight, his eyes GLOWING LIKE FIRE. He surveys the sleeping clan, moves straight toward Billy stands inches away from him, watches him with an intense Billy stirs slightly. The embers cast an orange glow on Kimberly's sleeping fac A SHADOW moves over her and two CRANE LEGS step into fram There's a FLURRY OF FLAPPING WINGS as a FALCON SWOOPS DOW lands on a rock directly above Tommy.  The bird fixes on with its piercing eyes. We hear a GRUNTING SOUND as the SILHOUETTE OF AN APE APPE Now a FROG HOPS through the air and lands inches away fro Adam.  The frog sits there a moment, it's THROAT THROBBIN Now we hear a DEEP GROWL and a tree SHAKES.  Aisha fidget her sleep as an ENORMOUS BEAR SHADOW FALLS OVER HER. Now, all at once, the six animals VANISH INTO THIN AIR LI SPIRITS OF THE NIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivan and Goldar patrol the parents who are busy digging. IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's pick it up here!  I've got a schedule to keep.  In twenty four hours the ooze is gonna hit the fan! Goldar suddenly point to the sky. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, boss!

dialogues.speaker: THE TENGU DROPS INTO THE SCENE, SQUEALING
dialogues.text: MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What kind of landing was that?! These clowns are a menace to the sky IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you fare? Mordant waves Ivan off. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, it couldn't've gone better. The Power Rangers didn't know what hit them . The Tengu appear, one of them SQUAWKS and makes grand ges MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right.  And then we threw one of them off a mountain and another one into a raqing river! IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So they've been destroyed? The Tengu SQUAWKS some more. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Basically". IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean "basically"? MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well... we were about to finish them off... when this huge monster came out of nowhere! MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, maybe he wasn't so huge. But you should've seen the size of his STICKS A pensive look comes over Ivan... IVAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did these sticks make a whistling sound? MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Hasta la Pasta, Bigbird! Billy swings his sticks, BASHES one of the Tengu in the b the creature EXPLODES INTO A CLOUD OF FEATHERS! BILLY

Aisha turns to Rocky. AISHA

dialogues.text: That should do it.  we won't be able to hear them, but they SHOULD be able to hear us. (beat)

They approach the massive block, stand before it in awe s silence.  In the middle of the Monolith there's a large c with the six animals of the Ninjetti carved into it. ROCKY

dialogues.text: ... The Nathadian Monolith... Kimberly looks at all the bones -- instinctively puts her on her animal symbol. KIMBERLY

dialogues.text: We've come all this way for a rock wall?! BILLY

dialogues.text: There should be a way to open it. Billy &;Tommy latch their hands over the block, searc an opening. BILLY

dialogues.text: Release the power with the power. Rocky steps back, THROWS HIS SHOULDER into the Monolith w THUMP, winces in pain. AISHA

dialogues.text: Not that kind of power. The kids exchange discouraged looks. BILLY

dialogues.text: ... There has to be something we're missing. The kids look crestfallen. ROCKY

dialogues.text: It can't end like this... Suddenly a SIZZLE OF ELECTRICITY forms in front of them. KIMBERLY

dialogues.text: What NOW! The kids mouth's fall open as... a HOLOGRAPHIC IMAGE OF ZORDON'S WITHERED FACE APPEARS.  He speaks in a barely audible voice. ZORDON

dialogues.text: Rangers... Ivan has invaded the city... time is running out... Zordon's image FLICKERS a few times then STABILIZES again ZORDON

dialogues.text: Each of you are now in possession of miraculous skills... but only when the six become one will you have the strength to harness the Great Power. His IMAGE FLICKERS then FADES AWAY. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: ZORDON
dialogues.text: Billy studies the circle with zealous eyes. TOMMY

dialogues.text: I am the wolf, cunning and swift! KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am the crane, agile and sublime! AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am the bear, stalwart and bold! ADAM

dialogues.text: I am the frog, quick as lightning! ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am the mighty ape! TOMMY

dialogues.text: A mysterious HALO OF LIGHT SHROUDS the Rangers and they d INTO THIN AIR.

dialogues.text: The kids BURST THROUGH A WALL OF LIGHT and come down toge inside a vast cavern.  There's a pyramid shaped steel obj the center of the room, a RADIANT LIGHT SHINING FROM IT. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What HAPPENED?! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we?! BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course!  The power is of another world.  Another dimension. KIMBERLY

dialogues.speaker: TOAST
dialogues.text: ROCKY

dialogues.text: That's twenty seconds!! The kids advance toward the pyramid. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Release the power WITH the power. AISHA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does that mean?! Adam notices their symbols are glowing. BILLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our SYMBOLS. The kids ogle the radiant emblems.  Kimberly takes hold o and it COMES OFF in her hand -- there's a mirror on the o side. ROCKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: The Rangers are gathered around Zordon, holding their hel in their hands. ZORDON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rangers, by going after the Great Power, all of you knowingly put your lives at extreme risk... and in so doing you not only saved my life, you saved all of Angel Grove and the world from a reign of unthinkable terror. The Rangers literally beam.  Alpha holds up a camera. ALPHA 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody say cheese. The kids share amused looks and all together they LEAP IN AIR, PUMPING THEIR FISTS UP VICTORIOUSLY. RANGERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rita and Zedd chase Mordant and Goldar around the palac BLASTING them with their staffs. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What'd we do?! ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not what you DID, it's what you DIDN'T do! MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We tried to rescue you every chance we had! RITA

dialogues.speaker: LIARS
dialogues.text: She WHACKS Goldar. GOLDAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ouch!! RITA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know what it's like to be stuck in a BLIZZARD FOR TWO

dialogues.speaker: DAYS
dialogues.text: MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Cold? ZEDD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you trying to be funny?! Zedd BLASTS Mordant, SINGING his hairy behind. MORDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, watch the hair!!! FADE OUT.
